subject: GRK
title: Introductory Greek for Graduate Students
description: A course designed for graduate level students beginning the study of Ancient Greek. This course will teach the foundational grammar, syntax and vocabulary in an accelerated way, while also training students in graduate level interpretation of texts in the original language. The student will also meet individually with the  professor for advanced work, so that the student will have completed the equivalent of up to GRK 201 by the end of the course.
